data.caption: Disclosure Of Related Party Transaction For The Half Year Ended 31St March, 2021.
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 23(9) of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith disclosure on Related Party Transactions of the Company on consolidated basis for the half year ended 31st March, 2021.

data.caption: Audited Standalone And Consolidated Financial Results For The Quarter/Year Ended 31St March 2021.
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 33(3) of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith the Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter/ year ended 31st March, 2021 along with Auditors' Report, declaration under Regulation 33(3)(d) of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015 and copy of Press Release.
